resources.string: Could not retrieve data from server
To retain RM library workable with high priority

Mesh User is the default settings. You are able to see and communicate with other Nearby users without any internet.

Data SellerNearby Use Data Buyer to share your internet connection to other Nearby users.


Use
to use internet shared by other
users.

Internet User is the only Internet using settings . You are able to see and communicate with other Internet users \directly.

Data SellerNearby Use Data Buyer to share your internet connection to other Nearby users.


Use
to use internet shared by other
users.
You are trying to switch from MESH USER to DATA BUYER role. You will be able to purchase data from nearby sellers. Are you sure to proceed?
You are trying to switch from MESH USER to DATA SELLER role. You will be able sell your mobile data to nearby users. Are you sure to proceed?
You are trying to switch from MESH USER to INTERNET USER role. You will be able to use internet to get internet users. Are you sure to proceed?
You are trying to switch from DATA BUYER to DATA SELLER role. You can not use your purchased data in this mode, rather you can sell your mobile data to nearby users. Are you sure to proceed?
You are trying to switch from DATA BUYER to MESH USER role. You can not use your purchased data in this mode, rather you can only use the mesh network. Are you sure to proceed?
You are trying to switch from DATA BUYER to INTERNET USER role. You will be able to use internet to get internet users. Are you sure to proceed?

You are trying to switch from DATA SELLER to DATA BUYER role. Your customers can not use purchased data from you in this mode, rather you can purchase data from nearby sellers. Are you sure to proceed?
You are trying to switch from DATA SELLER to MESH USER role. Your customers can not use purchased data from you in this mode, rather you can only use the mesh network. Are you sure to proceed?
You are trying to switch from DATA SELLER to INTERNET USER role. You will be able to use internet to get internet users. Are you sure to proceed?
You are trying to switch from INTERNET USER to DATA BUYER role. You will be able to purchase data from nearby sellers. Are you sure to proceed?
You are trying to switch from INTERNET USER to DATA SELLER role. You will be able sell your mobile data to nearby users. Are you sure to proceed?
You are trying to switch from INTERNET USER to MESH USER role. You can not use your purchased data in this mode, rather you can only use the mesh network. Are you sure to proceed?
Switching your role, please be patient.
Data limit must be larger than used data
*data limit must be larger than used data
You have earning in different network.
You have purchase in different network.
Read, Write and Location Services Permission required for this app
This app require permission to use awesome feature. Grant them in app settings.
This app require system setting to use awesome feature.Please allow modification.
The app needs GPS permissions. Please grant this permission to continue using the features of the app.

Mesh User in the default settings. You are able to communicate with your local peers without any internet connection.

To share your internet data to local network, choose Data Seller.

To view available shared internet options, choose Data Buyer.
1. Please open Hotspot settings and Change security settings to WPA2 PSK
2. Copy and paste respective fields below
